404_page_content.other:
Ci dispiace, sembra che questa pagina non esista.

Potrebbe essere stata spostata o rimossa.

Prova a tornare alla homepage per trovare quel che cercavi.

Torna alla Home

validation_gender_required.other: Please select the closest gender you identify with.

validation_dob_required.other: Please enter your date of birth.

validation_dob_date.other: Please enter a valid date of birth.

shopping_info_subtitle_wallet.other: Funds in your Wallet may be used for the purchase or rental of any content on ScreenPlus.

shopping_info_subtitle_help.other: Controlla qui i requisiti di sistema.

shopping_info_release_date_explanation_r.other: Lo puoi noleggiare ora, ma lo potrai vedere solo da quando sarà disponibile.

shopping_info_release_date_explanation_b.other: You can buy it now, but you won't be able to watch it until then.

shopping_info_available_until_date_expla.other: You will not be able to view the content after this.
You will not be able to view the content after this.

shopping_info_rental_period_coming_soon.other: dalla data e ora della pubblicazione.

shopping_info_watch_window_explanation_f.one: Once rented, your film will be available in your account for a day.
shopping_info_watch_window_explanation_f.other: Una volta noleggiato, il film sarà disponibile nel vostro account per {{.Count}} giorni.

shopping_info_watch_window_explanation2_.one: Once you press play, the watch window begins and you have an hour to watch the film as many times as you like.
shopping_info_watch_window_explanation2_.other: Una volta premuto play, inizia la finestra di riproduzione e avete {{.Count}} ore di tempo per completare la visione e guardare il film tutte le volte che vorrete.

shopping_info_watch_window_explanation_b.one: Once rented, the items in your bundle will be available in your account for a day.
shopping_info_watch_window_explanation_b.other: Once rented, the items in your bundle will be available in your account for {{.Count}} days.

shopping_info_watch_window_explanation2_.one: Once you press play on a specific film, the watch window begins and you have an hour to watch that film as many times as you like.
shopping_info_watch_window_explanation2_.other: Once you press play on a specific film, the watch window begins and you have {{.Count}} hours to watch that film as many times as you like.

shopping_info_watch_window_explanation_s.one: Once rented, your season will be available in your account for a day.
shopping_info_watch_window_explanation_s.other: Once rented, your season will be available in your account for {{.Count}} days.

shopping_info_watch_window_explanation2_.one: Once you press play on an episode, the watch window begins and you have an hour to watch that episode as many times as you like.
shopping_info_watch_window_explanation2_.other: Once you press play on an episode, the watch window begins and you have {{.Count}} hours to watch that episode as many times as you like.

shopping_enter_card_prompt.other: Inserisci i dati della tua carta di credito per completare l'ordine.

shopping_terms.other: Procedendo con questo pagamento, accetto i termini e le condizioni.

shopping_auth_directions.other: È necessario avere un Account. Inserisci il tuo indirizzo email.

shopping_error_missing_card.other: Please enter your Credit Card details.

shopping_error_incorrect_number.other: Please enter a valid Credit Card Nunber.

shopping_error_invalid_number.other: Please enter a valid Credit Card Nunber.

shopping_error_card_declined.other: La carta di credito è stata rifiutata.

shopping_error_creditcard_country_mismat.other: Your {{.Ownership}} has not been completed. You need to be in the country your credit card was issued. Please use another card for making the payment.

shopping_error_proxy_detected.other: Your {{.Ownership}} has not been completed. We have detected that you are using an unblocker or proxy service. Please turn off any of these services and try again.

shopping_error_discount_worn_out.other: That promo code can no longer be used.

shopping_error_discount_already_applied.other: A promo code has already been used for this session.

shopping_error_discount_already_redeemed.other: That promo code has already been used.

shopping_error_discount_used_previously.other: That promo code has already been used.

shopping_error_discount_max_limit.other: That promo code can no longer be used.

That promo code can not be used when renting.

shopping_error_discount_invalid_item.other: That promo code can not be used with this item.

shopping_error_discount_invalid_pricing_.other: That promo code can not be used in your country.

shopping_error_discounts_not_allowed.other: That promo code can not be used.

shopping_error_discount_disallowed_on_bu.other: That promo code can not be used on bundles.

shopping_error_payment_intent_authentica.other: The Credit Card has been declined. Please try again.

shopping_complete_rental_period.one: You are now able to watch it as often as you like over the next day.
shopping_complete_rental_period.other: You are now able to watch it as often as you like over the next {{.Count}} days.

shopping_complete_credit_purchase.other: Thank you for purchasing {{.Title}}, {{.CreditTotal}} has been added to your account.

shopping_complete_purchase_coming_soon.other: You will be able to watch it from {{.Date}}.

shopping_complete_receipt.other: La ricevuta ti è stata inviata via email.

shopping_complete_library_link.other: Start watching any of the {{.BundleItems}} in your library now.

shopping_complete_rental_watch_window_st.one: You are now able to start watching it within the next day.
shopping_complete_rental_watch_window_st.other: You are now able to start watching it within the next {{.Count}} days.

shopping_complete_rental_watch_window_en.one: When playback is started you will then have an hour to watch the item as many times as you like.
shopping_complete_rental_watch_window_en.other: Dopo aver cliccato su Guarda Ora hai {{.Count}} ore per vedere il film.

shopping_complete_rental_coming_soon.one: You will be able to watch it from {{.Date}} and your rental will remain active for a day.
shopping_complete_rental_coming_soon.other: You will be able to watch it from {{.Date}} and your rental will remain active for {{.Count}} days.

shopping_complete_rental_coming_soon_wat.one: You will be able to watch it from {{.Date}} and your rental will remain active for a day.
shopping_complete_rental_coming_soon_wat.other: You will be able to watch it from {{.Date}} and your rental will remain active for {{.Count}} days.

userwishlist_empty_content.other: Riempilo sfogliando la nostra fantastica selezione.

activatedevice_page_content.other: Follow the instructions on your device to get a PIN code. Your computer and device must both be connected to the internet to activate.

activatedevice_form_error_invalid_code.other: PIN Code not found, please try again.

activatedevice_form_error_pin_not_found.other: PIN Code not found, please try again.

activatedevice_signin_prompt.other: Please sign in before activating your device.

activatedevice_page_activated.other: Thank you for activating {{.DeviceName}}. You should now be able to browse your library on your television or device.

userdevices_page_content.one: I dispositivi verranno aggiunti automaticamente qui quando saranno attivati. Puoi aggiungere fino a 1 dispositivi.
userdevices_page_content.other: I dispositivi verranno aggiunti automaticamente qui quando saranno attivati. Puoi aggiungere fino a {{.Count}} dispositivi.

playlist_sign_in_warning.other: Please sign in to watch live TV.

cookie_banner_message.other: Utilizziamo cookies e altre tecnologie per migliorare la tua navigazione. Utilizzando il nostro sito Web, accetti queste condizioni. Leggi la nostra informativa sulla privacy per scoprire a cosa servono i cookies e come modificare le tue impostazioni.

all_rights_reserved.other: Tutti i diritti riservati. Nessuna parte di questo sito può essere riprodotta senza la nostra autorizzazione scritta.
